content: CPF PFF Panel 1 Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by Robert Antonius HenruAsked on 02 Mar 2019Between paying up HDB loan, stocking up CPF SA, and other investments, whats your recommendation for spare cash i have?2 answersAnswerBump2

Loo Cheng Chuan, Founder at 1M65 MovementLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 05 Mar 2019I am a big fan of US ETFs, buy and hold over a long period. Forget STI. Hopeless index relative to the S&P500.0 comments1
Dawn FionaLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 03 Mar 2019Consider Singapore Savings Bonds (SSB) if you're risk adverse but still want higher yield than what the banks can give you.0 comments0
